page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT IN SLOUGH
page.content: Slough hasn't got a very big entertainment scene. The main source for this is the Fulcrum Centre. This is in the town centre and it houses all kinds of activities such as plays, concerts and even sports like darts & wrestling which have appeared on TV. The Fulcrum is under threat of closure from the council and judging by the public reaction they do not seem too bothered. The cinema is the other amusement in Slough. There are two cinemas and the films that have the biggest audiences are usually kept on for a few weeks until their popularity dies. From our survey we found that Slough's people don't really want any more entertainment centres, but I think there should be more for the young, such as pop concerts with big stars.
